===Etymology===
{{com|ja|連|投|tr1=ren|tr2=tō|t1=consecutive; successive}}. For the baseball sense, {{m|ja|投}} is likely a shortening of {{m|ja|投げる||tr=nageru|to throw}}, and for the internet sense, {{m|ja|投}} is likely a shortening of {{m|ja|投稿|投稿する|tr=tōkō|to post}}.
